text: Note that due to a data loss on 26/27 Nov 2009 the issue that was originally created as bug 48297 was lost. It has been re-created as bug 48308.

text:
Fixed in 7.0.x and will be included in 7.0.1 onwards.

I don;t have a test case so the fix is based on a review of the JavaDoc and a review of the code.
